name: Ancient Roman Vase
description: An authentic golden vase from the late Roman era, perfectly preserved with intricate engravings.

name: Vintage Mechanical Typewriter
description: A rare 1920s mechanical typewriter. Fully functional and restored for high-end collectors.

description: Hand-forged steel blade with a traditional silk-wrapped handle from the historic Edo period.

name: Egyptian Pharaoh Mask
description: A high-quality replica of an 18th Dynasty burial mask, plated in 24k gold leaf.

name: Medieval Knight Helmet
description: Polished steel great helm used during the 14th century crusades. Includes authentic battle marks.

name: Victorian Pocket Watch
description: A silver-engraved mechanical pocket watch with moon phase complications, circa 1890.

name: Renaissance Oil Painting
description: Original landscape study from the Italian Renaissance, featuring classical brush techniques.

name: Ancient Mayan Sculpture
description: Stone-carved deity representation found in the heart of the Yucatan Peninsula ruins.

name: First Edition Classic Novel
description: Rare first printing of a literary masterpiece with original dust jacket and author signature.

name: Antique Brass Telescope
description: Navigational telescope used by maritime explorers in the early 19th century.

name: Fossilized Dinosaur Egg
description: A museum-quality Protoceratops egg fossil from the Late Cretaceous period.

name: Persian Silk Carpet
description: Hand-knotted silk carpet with 1,200 knots per inch, featuring royal garden motifs.

name: Celtic Silver Brooch
description: Intricate knotwork design made of solid silver, typical of ancient Scottish nobility.

name: Imperial Chinese Tea Set
description: Delicate porcelain set used during the Ming Dynasty, hand-painted with cobalt blue.

name: Vintage Film Camera
description: Legendary 35mm rangefinder camera known for its iconic lens quality and mechanical precision.

name: Antique Chess Set
description: Luxury chess pieces carved from ebony and ivory-style resin, with a marble board.

name: Ming Dynasty Vase
description: An exquisite blue and white porcelain vase from the Ming Dynasty, featuring intricate hand-painted dragon motifs.
